column1: Little Goat Diner////How is this possible?! I just can't even. If you are broke
column2: but like food too much for your wallet's own good
column3: this is a dream. The recent highbrow-lowbrow trend is really doing it for me. Obviously this is diner food
column4: and obviously it is all amazingly delicious. But everytime I've been
column7: and the cocktail menu -- waiting for a table has always been more pleasant than it has any right to be.
